JOB.DESCRIPTION: 1. Clean up (delete) any transactions where the status is null, blank, Pending, or Started, or has been in Reject status for over 24 hours. 2. Set the Minimum and Maximum dates allowed for preparing transactions, on the first run of the month only. 3. Create a transaction posting file to be submitted to Prologue for any transactions in Approve status as of the execution of this job.
